|strength?

|the Batlinpic!

48.「逃がしはせんっ！: I won't let you get away!

71.「それで 困ってたところに 現れたのが| オメーだったわけさ。あんまり 都合よく: I was in trouble, and then you showed up. It|was so convenient that at first I thought|Brandon was setting me up.
